settings.title: SECOND LIFE
settings.sub_title: Give your  designer bag a second life
settings.desc:
Before anything else, we believe in quality & timelessness. By selling your perfectly maintained bag, you are helping us build a more responsible fashion industry.

Send us your old Jeune Premier bag between June 20th - July 20th 2023 and receive a shopping voucher up to â‚¬50.

Be sure to subscribe on our newsletter to be up to date about the second life project!
settings.link_txt: Read more about Jeune Premier Second life
settings.link_hover_txt: Read more about Jeune Premier Second life

settings.name: 1. Select your bag
settings.department: Select your Jeune Premier bag you wihs to sell. Upload photos of the bag you want to sell in different angles.

settings.name: 2. Get your quote
settings.department: As soon as we approve your request, we'll tell you how much shopping credit you could earn on selling your old Jeune Premier Bag.

settings.name: 3.  Send us the bag
settings.department: Send us your items by post using the pre-paid label you received by email from us.

settings.name: 4. Receive your shopping voucher
settings.department: Receive your voucher via email to be used on our Jeune Premier Official website. Have fun shopping!

settings.title: Here's how it works
settings.desc: Clear space in your wardrobe and earn Jeune Premier credit by selling your designer bag through our Second Life service.

settings.title: Dirty bag?
settings.sub_title: No worries! We have the perfect solution for you.
settings.desc:
Just like a nice handbag, you shouldn't put a school backpack in the washing machine! 

In order to give our bags the spotlight they deserve throughout their lifespan, we have teamed up with the renowned Belgian company Eres to develop a unique cleaning formula. The Jeune Premier Cleaner is a handy 100 ml spray. 

You can easily spray it onto all Jeune Premier fabrics and rub it in with a damp cloth for excellent results!
